ProductInfo.Features:
Cutting-edge H.264 recording technology means less storage needed and higher image quality
Lets you "set and forget" by recoding continuously from all 4 cameras for over 30 days
Equipped with remote viewing software to stream over the web remotely
View and record 4 channels simultaneously so you won't miss any suspicious activity
Professional security solution for home or business at a fraction of the price with no ongoing monthly fees
H.264 4-Channel Dvr
Just Add Cameras
Latest Recording Technology ,Fast Playback & Less Hard Drive Usage
